title: Legendary Snowball - Time Starts
body:
Hi,
In the "Look out! It's Snowdown!" page, it says that LEGENDARY SNOWBALL goes from 23/12 to 8/1. Does this mean that it starts on the 23/12, at 00:00 AEDT? Is it possible that there **could** be some issues implementing it like there was for the Snowdown Shop? 
Thanks,
og1764

replies.body: Just bought Primetime Draven and no Mystery Chest came with it, so I'm thinking we need to wait until like 7pm tonight (like the other sub-events)

There will likely be an announcement made either on the Boards or in the client regarding the start of Legendary Snowball, so I'd keep an eye out. Otherwise, when the 23rd comes around, just ask on the Boards, and I can double check that for you! :)
